motd: Change: Now applies Grievous Wounds even if the damage dealt was completely mitigated by a shield.

passive_1: Dealing magic damage against champions applies 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
Dealing magic damage against champions applies 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
Dealing magic damage against champions applies 30%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
Dealing magic damage against champions applies 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
Dealing magic damage against champions applies 40%  Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds.
